name: Small Engine Repair
description: Events spin wildly out of control when three lifelong friends agree to do a favor on behalf of the brash young woman they all adore.

review.author: Nevergivea10
review.heading: It was worth the wait
review.reviewBody: It takes a long time before this movie really begins. Actually the boring beginning makes the last half even better. I wasn't expecting this movie to go where it went. Don't read the spoilers before you watch it and you'll be surprised.

keywords: male nudity,male bonding,brief male frontal nudity,friends reuniting,revenge
